title: KMPlayer (HD, Video) v1.6.9 (Mod Ad Free) (CTRC)

[b]Overview:[/b] Take The Worldâ€™s Best Desktop Video Player on the Go with KMPlayer Mobile!

KMPlayer is the world's best PC video player, chosen by over 300 million people from all around the world. We now bring our PC application to your Mobile!
Just like KMPlayer PC, KMPlayer Mobile, is a free encoding media player which supports and plays all video files.
Have a problem viewing your friendâ€™s video recorded on his Apple on your Android? Use KMPlayer!
We bring the same features that made KMPlayer PC popular to your Mobile: A user friendly interface, high quality video, high quality sound, and of course the ability to play all videos!

[b]*The worldâ€™s favorite player, KMPlayer!*[/b]

[b]What you can do with KMPlayer:[/b]
-One Finger Gesture Function for: video speed, sound adjustment, video skip/rewind, and brightness.
-Organizational function to allow you to structure your files how you want.
-A video media library function for all of your favorite lists.

[b]KMPlayerâ€™s Special Features:
[/b]
â—†With KMP Connect you can connect your PC to your KMPlayer Mobile App.
Watch movies on the go! KMP Connect has a strong connection and is easy to use! Connect NOW!

â—† Video formats that are supported by KMP
3gp, 3gp2, 3gpp, amv, asf, avi, axv, divx, dv, flv, f4v, gvi, gxf, m1v, m2p, m2t, m2ts, m2v, m4v, mks, mkv, moov, mov, mp2v, mp4, mpeg, mpeg1, mpeg2, mpeg4, mpg, mpv, mt2s, mts, mxf, nsv, nuv, oga, ogg, ogm, ogv, ogx, spx, ps, qt, rec, rm, rmvb, tod, ts, tts, vob, vro, webm, wm, wmv, wtv, xesc.

â—† Codecs that are supported by KMP
